content.rendered:
This balancing mineral infusion firms and repairs skin from within, minimising lines and supporting cell renewal. It’s brilliant as a leave-on gel post-cleansing and exfoliating; it’s fantastic as a mattifying primer under makeup and enhances the absorption of the moisturiser to follow.

Nourishing plant essences of lavender, geranium, ylang ylang and cedarwood quickly absorb to stabilise the sebaceous glands and balance the oil secretion, for a mattifying effect. Extracted palmarosa prevents infection, relieves inflammation and controls blemishes.

The texture is exquisite and the effect on skin instantly visible.

excerpt.rendered: This balancing mineral-rich infusion firms and repairs skin from within.
